short_summary: Royal Canadian Mounted Police requires a Psychologist for critical incident stress management (CISM) support services.
full_summary:
### Psychologist for Critical Incident Debriefs
#### Tender Title
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is soliciting services for a Psychologist to provide critical incident stress management support in Manitoba.

#### Reference Information
* Reference Number: PW-22-01006460
* Solicitation Number: M5000-22-5842/A
* Tender Closing Date: 05 October 2022 16:00:00 (EDT)

#### Service Description
The RCMP requires the services of a qualified Psychologist to provide critical incident stress management (CISM) support to employees and their families in Manitoba. The Psychologist will conduct psychological debriefings, crisis interventions, and coordinate health programs in collaboration with the RCMP's Health Services and the CISM Program. The services will be required for approximately 72 hours (3 days) per month. The contract term is two years, with an option to extend for up to three additional one-year periods.

#### Selection Criteria
This is a Request for Proposal (RFP). The selection criteria will be based on the proposal submitted by the bidder.

#### Contact Information
For any inquiries or questions related to this solicitation, please contact:
Simonson, Sheena
Email: [sheena.simonson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:sheena.simonson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
Phone: 306-515-1563

#### Attachments
The RFP and supporting documents can be accessed at the following URL:
* English version: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/08/3a2be4237ebbc11d367d98f9f279725a/202205842_-_rfp_-_en_-_psychologist_critical_incident_debriefs.pdf>
* French version: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/08/feab136344186a5f112c1d6bdea3b189/202205842_-_rfp_-_fr_-_psychologist_critical_incident_debriefs.pdf> Feedback
